title: Diploma in Hair Dressing
subtitle: Professional training in hair styling, cutting, colouring & salon hair services
description: The Diploma in Hair Dressing is a professional program focused on building strong skills in hair theory, hair styling, hair cutting, colouring, chemical treatments, and scalp care. The course combines theory with extensive practical training to prepare students for real salon environments.
whatYouWillLearn: Hair styling (blow dryer, ironing, crimping, curling)
Hair setting (blast dry, flat dry, in curls, out curls)
Basic hair cuts (one length, V cut, U cut, layer cut, bob – basic, feather cut)
Advance hair cuts (graduation bob, square layer, shag cut, pixie hair cut, face framing, natural inversion cut, blended elevation)
